title: Mini-Ep 255: Hang On To Your Nails
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 255: Hang On To Your Nails
itunes:subtitle: Kate shears the calluses on her feet like a sheep and Doree gets glam with some press-on nails. Then, listeners share their stress and anxieties from life, ask for advice on how to deal with the holidays as a newly-orphaned adult, and wonder how best t...
description:
Kate shears the calluses on her feet like a sheep and Doree gets glam with some press-on nails. Then, listeners share their stress and anxieties from life, ask for advice on how to deal with the holidays as a newly-orphaned adult, and wonder how best to store jewelry.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
